message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand its worth to be $12000. To make this opportunity more attractive to you, I am offering it at a special introductory price of $10800. This represents a significant savings of 10% off its full value. I trust this pricing will facilitate your decision-making process and allow you to enjoy all the benefits this product has to offer. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. I look forward to your positive response.
